topic.title: Earthnet (just a Frontpage for the project)

1_19oTjiELVv5NKUxcchx4F7vyoznBfgodur.body: thanks maan, will keep u updated :)
Ipfs also supports dynamic content, its called ipns (inter planetary file system) where u can update your content by adding new ipfs-files or folders.
There should be a chat inside that frontpage now , just to try something out :D
can someone pls write in the chat, just to test if its working ? thanks  :D
